Traits.Name: Lipid Sheath
Traits.Content: Enveloped has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from non-magical weapons while it has temporary hit points.

Traits.Name: Viral Load
Traits.Content: When a creature is hit by Enveloped's natural attack or starts its turn in its 10-ft Aerosol Aura, it must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it gains 1 Viral Load (maximum 3 stacks). Each stack imposes a -1 penalty to attack rolls and checks, and at 3 or more stacks, the target is poisoned and cannot regain hit points until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Enveloped makes four attacks: three with its Sticky Appendage and one with its Viral Burst.

Actions.Name: Sticky Appendage
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 Viral Load.

Actions.Name: Viral Burst
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 Viral Load.

Actions.Name: Infective Eruption
Actions.Content: Enveloped releases a cloud of infectious spores in a 10-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 30 (4d12 + 4) poison damage and gains 1 Viral Load. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and does not gain Viral Load. This action recharges on a roll of 5 or 6 on a d6.
